function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ignoring early warnings of climate crisis and pandemics","Impact":"Increased likelihood of unmitigated spread of contagious diseases, leading to widespread illness and death","Mitigation":"Proactive monitoring and response to early warnings and scientific evidence, implementation of policies to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, and preparation for potential pandemics","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation tools, early warning systems, public health surveillance technologies","People":"General public, policy makers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, international bodies"},{"Description":"Unabated increase in greenhouse gas emissions and global warming","Impact":"Irreversible changes to the climate, with significant environmental, social, and economic consequences","Mitigation":"Reduction of greenhouse gas emissions, transition to renewable energy sources, conservation and restoration of ecosystems","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage, sustainable land use practices","People":"Global population, future generations","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, private sector"},{"Description":"Accelerated spread of contagious diseases from global travel and urbanization","Impact":"Increased risk of introducing and spreading new and potentially devastating pathogens, leading to widespread global pandemics","Mitigation":"Global cooperation for disease surveillance and control, regulation of international travel and trade, investment in public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Global disease surveillance networks, rapid diagnostic tools, vaccine development and distribution systems","People":"International travelers, urban populations, public health agencies","Owner":"International health organizations, governments, global health bodies"}]}
